summary: Completed comprehensive testing of En Pixels e-commerce application. Backend APIs are 100% functional with all endpoints working correctly. Frontend core functionality works well including home page, product pages, cart, and checkout flow. Found one UI/UX issue with product card navigation.

ui_bugs.issue: Product cards are not clickable to navigate to individual product pages - only Add to Cart button works
ui_bugs.details: Users cannot click on product cards to view product details. They can only add to cart directly from catalog. Product pages work when accessed directly via URL.

passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/ returns Hello World message
Backend: GET /api/categories returns 3 categories (digital, prints, local)
Backend: GET /api/products returns 9+ seeded products with proper fields
Backend: GET /api/products with category filters work correctly
Backend: POST /api/orders creates orders with correct calculations
Backend: POST /api/orders with delivery method adds $7 delivery fee for physical items
Backend: POST /api/checkout/session creates mocked checkout session
Backend: GET /api/orders/{id} retrieves created orders
Frontend: Home page loads with hero, categories, featured products
Frontend: Navigation menu works (Home, Catalog, About, Contact links)
Frontend: Category navigation from home page works
Frontend: Product pages load correctly when accessed directly
Frontend: Add to Cart functionality works on product pages
Frontend: Cart count updates correctly
Frontend: Checkout page loads with all form elements
Frontend: Checkout form validation works
Frontend: Delivery method selection shows/hides address fields
Frontend: Order totals calculate correctly including delivery fees
Frontend: Place Order creates order and redirects to success page
Frontend: Success page displays order confirmation with order ID
Frontend: All required data-testid attributes are present
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix ProductCard component to make product cards clickable for navigation to individual product pages. Currently users can only add to cart from catalog but cannot view product details by clicking the card.
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (16/16 tests passed), Frontend: 95% (1 minor UI issue)
